Public API with base functionality

The tresos Studio plugin dreisoft.tresos.lib2.api.plugin contains the tresos Public API for basic operations like logging, debugging support and generic helper functionlity.

Error handling

A main functionality that is controlled by the lib2 api plug-in is the handling of errors that occure during calls to public API function. Errors can be dealt with in three different ways:

  • Return value: If all other error handling functionality is turned off errors are signalled via the return value of the public API function. The JavaDoc of the methods describe which return values may signal an error. As in some cases this error value can also be a regular return value this method is not always unambiguous.
  • Error message: When error messages are enabled the public API logs error messages to the Error Log facility of tresos.
  • Exception: When exceptions are enabled public API method throw an APIException. This exception is derived from RuntimeException and therefore need not be explicitly catched or thrown. Nevertheless all Public API method that throw such an exception document this in their signature.

How errors are handled is controlled via the Options class.

Package options

The Public API of tresos provides some generic or operation specific configuration options that control. All global options that apply to all sub modules like handling of debugging information and exception handling are configured with the classes in the dreisoft.tresos.lib2.api.options package.

Package log

The package dreisoft.tresos.lib2.api.log contains classes that allow to log info, warning and error message, basic Exception handlong as well as functionality to access the console view of tresos.

Package util

This package contains utility classes that ease the development of code for tresos Studio.

Public API to access the DataModel.

The tresos Studio plugin dreisoft.tresos.datamodel2.api.plugin contains the tresos Public API of dreisoft.tresos.datamodel2.plugin. This part of the tresos Public API will further be called datamodel2 Public API.

The Public API allows to access the DataModels that store configuration- and parameter definition data in a convenient way.

model Package

The heart of the datamodel2 Public API is the package dreisoft.tresos.datamodel2.api.model which hosts the class DCtxt to access the configuration.

model.expr Package

The package dreisoft.tresos.datamodel2.api.model.expr contains classes and interfaces that are used by the classes in the model package to produce node lists by selecting nodes by certain criterias.

model.path Package

The package dreisoft.tresos.datamodel2.api.path provides functionality to manipulate paths that are stored inside references.

model.xpath Package

The package dreisoft.tresos.datamodel2.api.xpath provides classes and interfaces that allow to implement own XPath functions that then can be used within XPath expressions.

attribute Package

The package dreisoft.tresos.datamodel2.api.attribute contains classes that allow to implement attributes usable in XDM files in Java via the datamodel2 Public API.

Public API to access the Launcher.

The plugin dreisoft.tresos.launcher2.api provides access to the EB tresos core framework serivces like project handling, code generator etc.

project Package

The dreisoft.tresos.launcher2.api.project package provides classes that give access to the EB tresos specific aspects of projects in the workspace. More generic project functionality (list of all projects, path to project...) is provided by the Eclipse platform itself.

module Package

The dreisoft.tresos.launcher2.api.module package provides access to the static information of modules registered via the dreisoft.tresos.launcher2.plugin.module extension-point.

module.transform Package

The dreisoft.tresos.launcher2.api.module.transform package provides the base class for implementing module transfers that allow to convert module configurations from one ECU configuration project to another changing target or implemented release version.

Public API to access the AUTOSAR specific or AutoCore specific functionality.

The tresos Studio plugin dreisoft.tresos.autosar2.api.plugin contains the tresos Public API of dreisoft.tresos.autosar2.plugin. This part of the tresos Public API will further be called autosar2 Public API.

The Public API provides AUTOSAR specific functionality or functionality implemented for the EB tresos AutoCore product.

model Package

The Public API provides additional AUTOSAR or AutoCore specific DataModel constants and functionality with the package model.

ecuresource Package

EB tresos allows to register ECU resource description in the form of properties files. Support for this feature can be found in the package ecuresource.

Public API for the Code Generator

The tresos Studio plugin dreisoft.tresos.generator.api.plugin contains the tresos Public API of to implement own code generators that run guided by EB tresos Studio.

generator Package

The Public API for the generator is located in the package dreisoft.tresos.generator.api.generator which hosts the interface ICodeGenerator which must be implemented to write an own code generator in Java

Public API to access the NG Generator Engine.

The tresos Studio plugin dreisoft.tresos.generator.ng.api.plugin contains the tresos Public API for using the Next Generation Generator Engine. This part of the tresos Public API will further be called NGGenerator Public API.

The NGGenerator provides an advanced framework for code generation in EB tresos Studio. The framework provides different engines by which code can be generated. The engines may be mixed and it is possible to call one engine from another engine. The engines implemented in the current EB tresos Studio version are the CDS Generator and the JET Generator.

Package Overview

ant Package

The ant package contains the interface IJavaGenTemplate that every NG generator must implement. Besides there is the JavaGenContext that is passed into the interface's generate method by the generator framework. With this context the generator can access the DCtxt, variables and other relevant information for the execution of the generator. See the ant package to learn about the ant tasks defined by the NG generator.

cds Package

The cds package contains the C Data Structure generator. It provides functionality to generate C code from Java objects. For more details and examples please see cds overview.

engines Package

This package contains the built-in generators CDS Generator and JET Generator.

Public API to create wizards in tresos Studio.

The tresos Studio plugin dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.plugin contains the tresos Public API for the development of wizards or module editors in tresos Studio.

The Public API care about the connection to the underlying XML data structure that stores the data from the wizard. By special operations, the PushOperations, the wizard data can be transfered to the tresos Studio Datamodel.

backend Package

Within the Model-View-Controller pattern, the backend is the controller part of the framework dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.backend which hosts the abstract class AbstractBackend that has to be extended when implementing a wizard.

context Package

The package dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.context contains classes that are holding information on the current selected project or module editor. These are required for the activation of triggers from the trigger package. But these contexts can also be accessed from within the backend, to gain these informations. Acquire the current DCtxt from the module editor for example. ECUConfigContext and ModuleConfigContext can be acquired through the ContextManager.

gui.form Package

The package dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui contains a factory class WidgetFactory that provides functions to create SWT widgets. It also handles the connection to the data layer. The widgets themselves are located in the gui.form package.

Further it contains the gui.databinding package which holds the MementoOperationHandler. Each operation on the Memento has to be done via this class as it provides undo/redo operations.

The gui.page package contains abstract classes which have to be extended when creating the gui part of a wizard. An AbstractPage or an AbstractMultiPage represent a page in a dialog or a tab in an editor.

memento Package

The package dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.memento provides a class Memento and an interface IMementoFactory. The Memento class provides functionality to set and get values from the memento XML file, that stores the wizard data. The IMementoFactory interface should be implemented if default values or value calculation should be done when the wizard is opened. A MementoFactory represents the schema for the wizard.

pushservice Package

The package dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.pushservice provides classes that can be extended when creating a PushOperation.

trigger Package

The package dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.trigger handles the loading of a wizard, but this is completely done by the guidedconfig internas.

Public API to manage workflows in tresos Studio.

EB tresos allows to model workflows that guide the user through required configuration activities. Workflows are shown in the Workflow view in the EB tresos GUI.

Workflows are described by XML files that describe the steps that form the workflow.

Workflows can be registered via the extension-point dreisoft.tresos.workflow.api.plugin.workflows.

The tresos Studio plugin dreisoft.tresos.workflow.api.plugin contains a Public API to manage workflows in EB tresos.

The Public API allows:

  • register new workflows
  • control which workflow is shown in the Workflow view
  • Query properties of registered workflows
  • Select the workflow that is initially shown in the Workflow view

Workflow descriptions

Workflow are described by XML files that conform to the XSD schema http://www.tresos.de/_projects/tresos/workflow_1_0.xsd. A workflow are composed of group and action steps. Group steps allow to group other steps. Action steps describe an action that the user has to perform.

A workflow description looks as follows: 

<w:workflow
    description="Create an ECU Configuration "
    id="AS" label="ECU Configuration" version="10.1"
    xmlns:w="http://www.tresos.de/_projects/tresos/workflow_1_0.xsd"
    xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
    <group id="GTL" label="Autosar" repeatable="false" type="sequence">
        <description>Create an ECU Configuration for Autosar 3.1</description>
        <group id="GP" label="Project Setup" repeatable="false" type="choice">
            <description>First a new project must be created or an existing must be selected</description>
            <action label="Create ECU configuration project" id="GP_C">
                <command
                    serialization="org.eclipse.ui.newWizard(newWizardId=newConfigurationProject)" />
                <description>Create a new ECU Configuration project by opening the new project wizard</description>
            </action>
        </group>
    </group>
</w:workflow>

For furher information please refer to the EB tresos user documentation.

workflows extension-point

The dreisoft.tresos.workflow.api.plugin plug-in allows to register workflows via the dreisoft.tresos.workflow.api.plugin.workflows extension-point.

Registrations look as following: 

 <extension
         point="dreisoft.tresos.workflow.api.plugin.workflow">
      <workflow
            file="workflows/AutoCore_Full_3_1.xml">
      </workflow>
   </extension>

workflows Package

This package contains the class Workflows that allows to manage workflows.
